description: Will update the backend configuration of OpenDJ via the dsconfig set-backend-prop command.

hostname.description: The hostname of the OpenDJ server.

value.description: The value for the configuration item.

state.description: If configuration needs to be added/updated

passwordfile.description: Location to the password file which holds the password for the cn=Directory Manager user. Either password or passwordfile is needed.

password.description: The password for the cn=Directory Manager user. Either password or passwordfile is needed.

opendj_bindir.description: The path to the bin directory of OpenDJ.

port.description: The Admin port on which the OpenDJ instance is available.

backend.description: The name of the backend on which the property needs to be updated.
